message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this exceptional product with you. I think you'll find it's a game-changer. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1200000.

Hello Alice, thank you for considering my interest in your product. I believe it has great potential, but I am looking to keep the cost within a certain budget. Would you be willing to consider a counteroffer of $950000?
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $950000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $1075000. This is my best price for now.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $1000000 for the product. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle of our previous offers.

Bob, I'm glad we're getting closer to a deal. However, I was hoping to get a bit more for the product. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to get at least $1075000 for it. I'm counteroffering at $1075000, and I hope this is the final stretch.
Alice, I understand your position, but I must stick to my budget. I'm proposing a final offer of $1050000 for the product. I hope this is acceptable.

Bob, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm not willing to go below $1075000. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'm counteroffering at $1075000, but I need you to meet me halfway. If you're not willing to do that, I'll have to consider other options.
Alice, I've done my best to meet you halfway, but unfortunately, I can't agree to $1075000. I'm making one last offer of $1050000. I hope this is the final offer you'll consider.

Bob, I understand you're making a final offer, but I'm not willing to accept $1050000. I'm willing to make one last concession, but I need you to meet me at $1075000. If not, I'll have to consider other options.
Alice, after careful consideration, I'm unable to meet you at $1075000. My final offer is $1050000. I hope this is the final offer you'll consider.
